channel.description: Recent content in responsibility on Leftpedia

item.title: At what level does it become about personal responsibility?
item.description: Eugene Debs wasn’t right about everything, but he was certainly right about a lot. We’ll leave you with this quote from him that is a core part of our philosophy: “While there is a lower class, I am in it. While there is a criminal element, I am of it. And while there is a soul in prison, I am not free.”
